author: anmenaga
body:
This fixes #2442
Added tests using: 1) 'subst.exe' utility 2) New-VHD/Mount-VHD cmdlets .
Also added tests that verify automounted drives without modules in the picture to use as baseline.

Test results on Hyper-V machine after fix:
![afterfix_onhypervmachine](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11860095/22225529/a31b901a-e177-11e6-82a9-f2242b2bb8f7.png)
Test results on Non-Hyper-V machine after fix:
![afterfix_onsimplevm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11860095/22225527/a31890ae-e177-11e6-94f2-0456afdc26ec.png)

For reference - test results on Hyper-V machine before fix:
![beforefix_onhypervmachine](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11860095/22225528/a31905e8-e177-11e6-8a78-5d3234fef89d.png)
For reference - test results on Non-Hyper-V machine before fix:
![beforefix_onsimplevm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11860095/22225530/a31c631e-e177-11e6-9dfa-c7c8a9483ac3.png)
title: Fix for #2442 - automounted drives in modules
